sourceMeaningMnemonic: You jump on your <radical>scooter</radical> with a big <radical>bundle</radical> to go as <kanji>fast</kanji> as you can! You have a bundle of pizzas in here, and they need to be delivered as fast as you can get them there!
meaningInfo: Imagine how fast you can go on your scooter holding this bundle. It's way faster than trying to go on foot, that's for sure!
readingMnemonic: You were going so <kanji>fast</kanji>, you only put on <reading>sock</reading>s (<ja>そく</ja>). So now you're barreling down the street at top speeds in just your sad, white socks.
readingInfo: Imagine riding the scooter as fast as you can in just your socks. You can feel the wind pulling them off your feet!
